<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Instance Backups and Backup Schedules</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/instances/{instance_id}/get_instance_backups_and_backup_schedules"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve information about backups and backup schedules for the specified instance.
